00057 
00058 void Terme_Source_inc_th_VDF_Face::associer_pb(const Probleme_base& pb)
00059 {
00060   if (sub_type(Pb_Fluide_base,pb) && (pb.nombre_d_equations()>1))
00061     {
00062       const Equation_base& eqn = pb.equation(1);
00063       if (sub_type(Convection_Diffusion_Temperature,eqn))
00064         {
00065           const Navier_Stokes_std& eqn_hydr = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,pb.equation(0));
00066           const Convection_Diffusion_Temperature& eqn_thermo = ref_cast(Convection_Diffusion_Temperature,eqn);
00067           Terme_Source_inc_th::associer_eqn(eqn_hydr);
00068           Terme_Source_inc_th::associer_eqn(eqn_thermo);
00069         }
00070     }
00071   else
00072     {
00073       Cerr << "Error for the method Terme_Source_inc_th_VDF_Face::associer_pb" << finl;
00074       Cerr << "The source term "<<que_suis_je()<<" cannot be activated for the problem "<<pb.que_suis_je()<< finl;
00075       exit();
00076     }
00077   const Fluide_base& fluide=eq_thermique().fluide();
00078   beta_t_=fluide.beta_t();
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 void Terme_Source_inc_th_VDF_Face::associer_zones(const Zone_dis& zone_dis,
00083                                                   const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_Cl_dis)
00084 {
00085   la_zone_VDF = ref_cast(Zone_VDF, zone_dis.valeur());
00086   la_zone_Cl_VDF = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VDF, zone_Cl_dis.valeur());
00087 }

00178       num2 = elem_faces(element_number,2);

00180 // uij_filt(element_number,0,0)=uij_filt_1(element_number,0);
00181 // uij_filt(element_number,1,0)=uij_filt_1(element_number,1);
00182 // uij_filt(element_number,0,1)=uij_filt_2(element_number,0);
00183 // uij_filt(element_number,1,1)=uij_filt_2(element_number,1);

00185         {
00186 // uij_filt(element_number,0,2)=uij_filt_3(element_number,0);
00187 // uij_filt(element_number,1,2)=uij_filt_3(element_number,1);

00194           inc_dv(element_number,1)=0.;
00195           inc_dv(element_number,2)=0.;
00196         }
00197 
00198       if (dimension == 2)
00199         {
00200           cell_cent_vel(element_number,0)=0.5*(vitesse[num0]+vitesse[num2]);
00201           cell_cent_vel(element_number,1)=0.5*(vitesse[num1]+vitesse[num3]);
00202           inc_dv(element_number,0)=0.;
00203           inc_dv(element_number,1)=0.;
00204         }
00205       else
00206         {
00207           cell_cent_vel(element_number,0)=0.5*(vitesse[num0]+vitesse[num3]);
00208           cell_cent_vel(element_number,1)=0.5*(vitesse[num1]+vitesse[num4]);
00209           cell_cent_vel(element_number,2)=0.5*(vitesse[num2]+vitesse[num5]);
00210         }
00211     }
00212   cell_cent_vel.echange_espace_virtuel();
00213

00254 // Cerr << me() << " boucle 1 " << finl;
00255   if (dimension ==2)
00256     {
00257       for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem ; element_number ++)
00258         {
00259 // for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i++)
00260 // for (j=0 ; j<dimension ; j++)
00261 // uij_filt(element_number,i,j)=cell_cent_vel(element_number,i)*
00262 // cell_cent_vel(element_number,j);
00263           for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i++)
00264             {
00265               uij_filt(element_number,i)=cell_cent_vel(element_number,i)*
00266                                          cell_cent_temp(element_number);
00267             }
00268           f0 = elem_faces(element_number,0);
00269           num0 = face_voisins(f0,0);
00270           f2 = elem_faces(element_number,2);
00271           num2 = face_voisins(f2,1);
00272           if ( (num0 == -1) || (num2 == -1) )
00273             {
00274               for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00275                 {
00276                   temp1(element_number,i)=cell_cent_vel(element_number,i);
00277                   inc_dv(element_number,i)=0.;
00278                 }
00279               temp1_t(element_number)=cell_cent_temp(element_number);
00280               inc_dt(element_number)=0.;
00281             }
00282           else
00283             {
00284               {
00285                 for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00286                   {
00287                     temp1(element_number,i)=0.25*(cell_cent_vel(num0,i)+
00288                                                   2.0*cell_cent_vel(element_number,i)+
00289                                                   cell_cent_vel(num2,i));
00290                   }
00291                 temp1_t(element_number)=0.25*(cell_cent_temp(num0)+
00292                                               2.0*cell_cent_temp(element_number)+
00293                                               cell_cent_temp(num2));
00294               }
00295               f0_1 = elem_faces(num0,0);
00296               num0_1 = face_voisins(f0_1,0);
00297               f2_1 = elem_faces(num2,2);
00298               num2_1 = face_voisins(f2_1,1);
00299               if ( (num0_1 == -1) || (num2_1 == -1) )
00300                 {
00301                   for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00302                     {
00303                       inc_dv(element_number,i)+=(cell_cent_vel(num0,i))-(cell_cent_vel(num2,i));
00304                     }
00305                   inc_dt(element_number)+=(cell_cent_temp(num0))-(cell_cent_temp(num2));
00306                 }
00307               else
00308                 {
00309                   for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00310                     {
00311                       inc_dv(element_number,i)+=(cell_cent_vel(num0_1,i))-(cell_cent_vel(num2_1,i));
00312                     }
00313                   inc_dt(element_number)+=(cell_cent_temp(num0_1))-(cell_cent_temp(num2_1));
00314                 }
00315             }

00390                   temp1(element_number,i)=cell_cent_vel(element_number,i);

00482 
00483       temp2.echange_espace_virtuel();
00484       temp2_t.echange_espace_virtuel();
00485       for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem ; element_number ++)
00486         {
00487           f2 = elem_faces(element_number,2);
00488           num2 = face_voisins(f2,0);
00489           f5 = elem_faces(element_number,5);
00490           num5 = face_voisins(f5,1);
00491           if ( (num2 == -1) || (num5 == -1) )
00492             {
00493               for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00494                 {
00495                   filt_vel(element_number,i)=temp2(element_number,i);
00496                   inc_dv(element_number,i)+=0.;
00497                 }
00498               filt_temp(element_number)=temp2_t(element_number);
00499               inc_dt(element_number)+=0.;
00500             }
00501           else
00502             {
00503               for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00504                 {
00505                   filt_vel(element_number,i)=0.25*(temp2(num2,i)+
00506                                                    2.0*temp2(element_number,i)+
00507                                                    temp2(num5,i));
00508                 }
00509               filt_temp(element_number)=0.25*(temp2_t(num2)+
00510                                               2.0*temp2_t(element_number)+
00511                                               temp2_t(num5));
00512 // Cerr << " not num2 et num5 " << num2 << " " << num5 << finl;
00513               f2_1 = elem_faces(num2,2);
00514               num2_1 = face_voisins(f2_1,0);
00515               f5_1 = elem_faces(num5,5);
00516               num5_1 = face_voisins(f5_1,1);
00517               if ( (num2_1 == -1) || (num5_1 == -1) )
00518                 {
00519                   for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00520                     inc_dv(element_number,i)+=(cell_cent_vel(num2,i))-(cell_cent_vel(num5,i));
00521                   inc_dt(element_number)+=(cell_cent_temp(num2))-(cell_cent_temp(num5));
00522                 }
00523               else
00524                 {
00525 // Cerr << " not num2_1 et num5_1 " << num2_1 << " " << num5_1 << finl;
00526                   for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00527                     {
00528                       inc_dv(element_number,i)+=(cell_cent_vel(num2_1,i))-(cell_cent_vel(num5_1,i));
00529                     }
00530                   inc_dt(element_number)+=(cell_cent_temp(num2_1))-(cell_cent_temp(num5_1));
00531                 }
00532             }
00533         }
00534     }
00535   filt_vel.echange_espace_virtuel();
00536   inc_dv.echange_espace_virtuel();
00537   filt_temp.echange_espace_virtuel();
00538   inc_dt.echange_espace_virtuel();
00539   uij_filt.echange_espace_virtuel();
00540   Cerr << " first loop " << finl;
00541 // 
00542 // calculer_Qij(inc_dv,Qij);
00543 // -------------------------------------------------------------------

00552 // This is to calculate the Qij tensor
00553 
00554 // for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem_tot ; element_number ++)

00557 // for (int j=0 ; j<dimension ; j++)

00560

00581

00594 
00595 // This is to calculate the filtered tensor field
00596 // int j;
00597 // Cerr << me() << " boucle 2 " << finl;
00598   if (dimension ==2)
00599     {
00600       for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem ; element_number ++)
00601         {
00602           f0 = elem_faces(element_number,0);
00603           num0 = face_voisins(f0,0);
00604           f2 = elem_faces(element_number,2);
00605           num2 = face_voisins(f2,1);
00606           if ( (num0 == -1) || (num2 == -1) )
00607 // for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00608 // for (j=0 ; j<dimension ; j ++)
00609 // ttemp1(element_number,i,j)=uij_filt(element_number,i,j);
00610             for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i++)
00611               {
00612                 ttemp1(element_number,i)=uij_filt(element_number,i);
00613               }
00614           else
00615             {
00616 // for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00617 // for (j=0 ; j<dimension ; j ++)
00618 // {
00619 // ttemp1(element_number,i,j)=0.25*(uij_filt(num0,i,j)+
00620 // 2.0*uij_filt(element_number,i,j)+
00621 // uij_filt(num2,i,j));

00626                                                  2.0*uij_filt(element_number,i)+
00627                                                  uij_filt(num2,i));
00628                 }
00629             }
00630         }

00633       for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem ; element_number ++)

00636           num1 = face_voisins(f1,0);
00637           f3 = elem_faces(element_number,3);
00638           num3 = face_voisins(f3,1);

00640 // for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00641 // for (j=0 ; j<dimension ; j ++)

00643             for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i++)
00644               {
00645                 uij_filt(element_number,i)=ttemp1(element_number,i);
00646               }
00647           else
00648             {
00649 // for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)
00650 // for (j=0 ; j<dimension ; j ++)
00651 // {
00652 // uij_filt(element_number,i,j)=0.25*(ttemp1(num1,i,j)+

00655 // }

00659                                                    2.0*ttemp1(element_number,i)+
00660                                                    ttemp1(num2,i));
00661                 }
00662             }
00663         }
00664     }
00665   else

00671           f3 = elem_faces(element_number,3);
00672           num3 = face_voisins(f3,1);
00673           if ( (num0 == -1) || (num3 == -1) )
00674 // for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)

00680               }

00682             {
00683 // for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i ++)

00762 // Cerr << me() << " boucle 3 " << finl;
00763   for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem ; element_number ++)
00764     {
00765 // for (int i=0 ; i<dimension ; i++)
00766 // for (int j=0 ; j<dimension ; j++)
00767 // {
00768 // Qij(element_number,i,j)=inc_dv(element_number,i)*inc_dv(element_number,j);

00770 // filt_vel(element_number,i)*filt_vel(element_number,j);
00771 // }
00772       for (int ii=0 ; ii<dimension ; ii++)
00773         {
00774           Qij(element_number,ii)=inc_dv(element_number,ii)*inc_dt(element_number);
00775           Lij(element_number,ii)=uij_filt(element_number,ii)-
00776                                  filt_vel(element_number,ii)*filt_temp(element_number);
00777         }
00778     }
00779 
00780   Lij.echange_espace_virtuel();
00781   Qij.echange_espace_virtuel();

00783 // calculer_f(Lij,Qij);
00784 // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00785 
00786   DoubleVect f(nb_elem);
00787 
00788 // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00789   DoubleVect temp_1(nb_elem);
00790   DoubleVect temp_2(nb_elem);
00791 
00792 // Evaluate the dynamic model coefficient f
00793   int elem;
00794   if (dimension == 2)
00795     for (elem=0; elem<nb_elem; elem++)
00796       {
00797 // temp_1(elem)=0.;
00798 // temp_2(elem)=0.;
00799 // for (int k=0 ; k<dimension ; k++)
00800 // for (int l=0 ; l<dimension ; l++)
00801 // {
00802 // temp_1(elem)+=Lij(elem,k,k);
00803 // temp_2(elem)+=4.*Qij(elem,l,l);
00804 // }
00805 
00806         temp_1(elem)=Lij(elem,0)+Lij(elem,1);
00807         temp_2(elem)=4.*Qij(elem,0)+4.*Qij(elem,1);
00808         if(dabs(temp_2(elem)) < 1.e-12)
00809           f(elem)=0.;
00810         else
00811           f(elem)=temp_1(elem)/temp_2(elem);
00812       }
00813   else
00814     for (elem=0; elem<nb_elem; elem++)
00815       {
00816 // temp_1(elem)=0.;
00817 // temp_2(elem)=0.;
00818 
00819         temp_1(elem)=Lij(elem,0)+Lij(elem,1)+Lij(elem,2);
00820         temp_2(elem)=4.*Qij(elem,0)+4.*Qij(elem,1)+4.*Qij(elem,2);
00821         if(dabs(temp_2(elem)) < 1.e-12)
00822           f(elem)=0.;
00823         else
00824           f(elem)=temp_1(elem)/temp_2(elem);
00825       }
00826 
00827   f.echange_espace_virtuel();
00828 // Cerr << " calculer_dQij_j" << f << " " << Qij << finl;
00829 // 
00830 // calculer_dQij_j(f,Qij,dQij_j);

00833 // DoubleTrav dQij_j(nb_elem_tot,dimension);

00840 // 
00841 // Calculate the source term dQij_j = d/dxj ( f Qij )
00842 // 
00843 // Cerr << me() << " boucle 4 " << nb_elem << finl;
00844   if (dimension ==2)
00845     {
00846       for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem ; element_number ++)
00847         {
00848           f0 = elem_faces(element_number,0);
00849           num0 = face_voisins(f0,0);
00850           if (num0 == -1)
00851             num0 = element_number;
00852           f1 = elem_faces(element_number,1);
00853           num1 = face_voisins(f1,0);
00854           if (num1 == -1)
00855             num1 = element_number;
00856           f2 = elem_faces(element_number,2);
00857           num2 = face_voisins(f2,1);
00858           if (num2 == -1)
00859             num2 = element_number;
00860           f3 = elem_faces(element_number,3);
00861           num3 = face_voisins(f3,1);
00862           if (num3 == -1)
00863             num3 = element_number;
00864           dQij_j(element_number)=0.5*((f(num2)*Qij(num2,0)-f(num0)*Qij(num0,0))/
00865                                       zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,0));
00866 // dQij_j(element_number,0)+=0.5*((f(num3)*Qij(num3,0)-f(num1)*Qij(num1,0))/
00867 // zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,1));

00869                                        zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,0));
00870 // dQij_j(element_number,1)+=0.5*((f(num3)*Qij(num3,1)-f(num1)*Qij(num1,1))/
00871 // zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,1));

00873 // zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,0));
00874 // dQij_j(element_number,0)+=0.5*((f(num3)*Qij_2(num3,0)-f(num1)*Qij_2(num1,0))/

00879 // zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,1));
00880         }
00881     }
00882   else
00883     {
00884       for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem ; element_number ++)
00885         {
00886           f0 = elem_faces(element_number,0);
00887           num0 = face_voisins(f0,0);
00888           if (num0 == -1 || num0 >= nb_elem)
00889             {
00890 // Cerr << me() << " bord num0 " << finl;
00891               num0 = element_number;
00892             }

00894           num1 = face_voisins(f1,0);
00895           if (num1 == -1 || num0 >= nb_elem)

00906             }

00958 // zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,1));
00959           dQij_j(element_number)+=0.5*((f(num5)*Qij(num5,2)-f(num2)*Qij(num2,2))/
00960                                        zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,2));

00963 // dQij_j(element_number,2)+=0.5*((f(num4)*Qij_2(num4,2)-f(num1)*Qij_2(num1,2))/
00964 // zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,1));
00965 // dQij_j(element_number,2)+=0.5*((f(num5)*Qij_3(num5,2)-f(num2)*Qij_3(num2,2))/
00966 // zone_VDF.dim_elem(element_number,2));
00967         }
00968     }
00969   dQij_j.echange_espace_virtuel();
00970   double min_f=1.e6, max_f=-1.e6;
00971   double min_q=1.e6, max_q=-1.e6;
00972   double min_dq=1.e6, max_dq=-1.e6;
00973   double min_dq1=1.e6, max_dq1=-1.e6, sum_t=0.;
00974   for (element_number=0 ; element_number<nb_elem ; element_number ++)
00975     {
00976       if (inc_dv(element_number,0)<min_q)
00977         min_q=inc_dv(element_number,0);
00978       if (inc_dv(element_number,0)>max_q)
00979         max_q=inc_dv(element_number,0);
00980       if (inc_dt(element_number)<min_f)
00981         min_f=inc_dt(element_number);
00982       if (inc_dt(element_number)>max_f)
00983         max_f=inc_dt(element_number);
00984       if (inc_dv(element_number,1)<min_dq)
00985         min_dq=inc_dv(element_number,1);
00986       if (inc_dv(element_number,1)>max_dq)
00987         max_dq=inc_dv(element_number,1);
00988       if (inc_dv(element_number,2)<min_dq1)
00989         min_dq1=inc_dv(element_number,2);
00990       if (inc_dv(element_number,2)>max_dq1)
00991         max_dq1=inc_dv(element_number,2);
00992       sum_t+=inc_dt(element_number);
00993     }
00994   Cerr << me() << " min/max " << min_f << " " << max_f << " "  << min_dq1 << " " << max_dq1 << finl;
00995   Cerr << " min/max " << (sum_t/nb_elem) << " "  << min_q << " " << max_q << " " << min_dq << " " << max_dq << finl;
00996 
00997   double inc_s=0;
00998 // Cerr << "Force de volume (gradient de pression moteur) = " << source << finl;
00999 
01000 // Boucle sur les conditions limites pour traiter les faces de bord
01001 // Cerr << me() << " cond lims " << finl;
01002   for (int n_bord=0; n_bord<zone_VDF.nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
01003     {
01004 
01005 // pour chaque Condition Limite on regarde son type
01006 // Si face de Dirichlet ou de Symetrie on ne fait rien
01007 // Si face de Neumann on calcule la contribution au terme source
01008 
01009       const Cond_lim& la_cl = zone_Cl_VDF.les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
01010 
01011       if (sub_type(Neumann_sortie_libre,la_cl.valeur()))
01012         {
01013 
01014 // const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl_neumann = ref_cast(Neumann_sortie_libre,la_cl.valeur());
01015           const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
01016           ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
01017           nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
01018 
01019           for (num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
01020             {
01021               vol = volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
01022               ncomp = orientation(num_face);
01023               num0 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
01024               if (num0 == -1)
01025                 num0 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
01026               inc_s=dQij_j(num0)*vol;
01027               inc_s=0.;
01028 // resu(num_face)+= s(ncomp)*vol;
01029               resu(num_face)+= inc_s;
01030             }
01031         }
01032 
01033       else if (sub_type(Symetrie,la_cl.valeur()))
01034         ;
01035       else if ( (sub_type(Dirichlet,la_cl.valeur()))
01036                 ||
01037                 (sub_type(Dirichlet_homogene,la_cl.valeur()))
01038               )
01039         ;
01040       else if (sub_type(Periodique,la_cl.valeur()))
01041         {
01042           const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,la_cl.frontiere_dis());
01043           ndeb = le_bord.num_premiere_face();
01044           nfin = ndeb + le_bord.nb_faces();
01045 
01046           for (num_face=ndeb; num_face<nfin; num_face++)
01047             {
01048               vol = volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
01049               ncomp = orientation(num_face);
01050               num0 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
01051               if (num0 == -1)
01052                 num0 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
01053               inc_s=dQij_j(num0)*vol;
01054               inc_s=0.;
01055 // resu(num_face)+= s(ncomp)*vol;
01056               resu(num_face)+= inc_s;
01057 
01058             }
01059         }
01060     }
01061 
01062 // Boucle sur les faces internes
01063   Cerr << me() << " faces internes thermique" << ch_beta(0,0) << finl;
01064 
01065   double min_inc=1.e6, max_inc=-1.e6;
01066   int num_e1, n_comp1;
01067   int num_e2, n_comp2;
01068   ndeb = zone_VDF.premiere_face_int();
01069   for (num_face =zone_VDF.premiere_face_int(); num_face<zone_VDF.nb_faces(); num_face++)
01070     {
01071 
01072       vol = volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
01073       ncomp = orientation(num_face);
01074       num0 = face_voisins(num_face,0);
01075       num1 = face_voisins(num_face,1);
01076       inc_s=0.5*(dQij_j(num0)+dQij_j(num1))*vol;
01077 // resu(num_face)+= s(ncomp)*vol;
01078       if (inc_s<min_inc)
01079         {
01080           min_inc=inc_s;
01081           num_e1=num0;
01082           n_comp1=ncomp;
01083         }
01084       if (inc_s>max_inc)
01085         {
01086           max_inc=inc_s;
01087           num_e2=num0;
01088           n_comp2=ncomp;
01089         }
01090     }
01091 // inc_s=0.;
01092   resu(num_face)+= inc_s;
01093   Cerr << min_inc << " " << num_e1 << " " << n_comp1 << finl;
01094   Cerr << max_inc << " " << num_e2 << " " << n_comp2 << finl;
01095   resu.echange_espace_virtuel();
01096   return resu;
01097 }
01098 
01099 DoubleTab& Terme_Source_inc_th_VDF_Face::calculer(DoubleTab& resu) const
01100 {
01101   resu = 0;
01102   ajouter(resu);
01103   resu.echange_espace_virtuel();
01104   return resu;
01105 }
